text: Mohammad Hussain (8 October 1976 â€“ 11 April 2022) was a Pakistani cricketer. He played in 2 Tests and 14 ODIs between 1996 and 1998. Hussain was born in Lahore, Pakistan. Hussain died on 11 April 2022 at a hospital in Lahore from problems caused by kidney disease, aged 45. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Pakistani cricketers Category:Deaths from kidney disease Category:Sportspeople from Lahore
title: Mohammad Hussain (cricketer)
